title: datacite
description: Schema for a servable function in DLHub

servable.description: Data needed to run a servable

type.description: Type of the servable, intended to be human-readable

shim.description: Name of the home_run shim that can use this metadata. Effectively, a human-unfriendly version of type.

language.language: Programming language used to invoke the servable

dependencies.description: List of additional libraries required by the servable. Currently only supports Python

model_type.description: Simple description of the type of machine learning model

model_summary.description: Longer-form description of a machine learning model. Contrast to model_type

methods.description: Methods available for a certain servable. Mapping of method name to method description.

run.description: Invoke a servable. This is the primary method of any servable

train.description: Reparameterize a model provided new data

test.description: Ensure that the container holding a servable is properly configured
